body:
`继续跟踪，发现异常重启后，dubbo根本没有再次去注册服务`
What do you mean by not register service when your application restart? 
 Every time you restart, it will be registered.

公司:美味不用等（上海）信息科技股份有限公司
地址：上海
联系方式： lj4418@126.com
业务场景：业务系统服务化

@chickenlj 每次重启（online状态下），com.alibaba.dubbo.registry.integration.RegistryProtocol#export第135行的register值是false，所以并没有去注册服务。
  
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3916627/34710673-4864a1f8-f557-11e7-98eb-fc605696440b.png)

公司:江苏爱福路
地址：南京
联系方式：qixiaobo@f6car.com
业务场景：业务系统服务化 微服务治理 服务间调用
@chickenlj 实际上是com.alibaba.dubbo.registry.integration.RegistryProtocol#getRegistedProviderUrl这个方法每次重启后都是生成新的url（timestamp不同），所以判断这个url是否注册返回的肯定是false，而false的情况下又不去注册。

Your application was force terminated, so previous url registered to registry can't be deleted (because of timestamp), the only way to unregister it is waiting for registry timeout and being unregistered automatically.

Even if you use `register=true`, dubbo handle all `register/unregister` automatically for you, the previous url still can't be unregistered until timeout. So i don't think this is not a problem of `online/offline`.

@chickenlj 也就是说：对于online状态的应用异常重启后，如果不执行online直接执行offline是无法下线服务的，除非服务超时后重新注册的服务才能offline？
  
PS：我现在的操作就是在任何offline前先执行online，只有这样才能保证下线能成功。

I have checked the callback mechanism:
1. I think you don't have to use an new `callback instance` every time.
2. Dubbo have a default 1000 limit of callback instance for each channel.

I don't recommend you use this feature: 
1. We plan to support async on provider side like `AsyncContext of Servlet3.0`
2. We may find a new way of supporting the streaming push ability provided by current callback mechanism.

总之

It's not easy to do this, but you have to consider the loss of nested MDC for asyn threads, so it's recommended that you add and support multi and asyn threads，slf4j is a good logging system. Logback itself can automatically print the log header  -> traceId. can add a switch control and scalable adaptive monitoring system, is relatively elegant.
for example -> logback: `<pattern>%d{MM-dd HH:mm:ss} [%X{jtraceId}] %2p %logger{0}:%L - %msg%n</pattern>`

Is this a TaskExecutor like `CachedThreadPool` in JDK? 

I think we should first consider the following scenarios before supporting this strategy:
* Do you think queue is more reasonable than failfast when thread is exhausted (the result may become meaningless if consumer timeout)?
* Creating of thread need some time which in turn increases delay.

谢谢您的反馈。
这里回答一下疑问

首先这不是一个CachedThreadPool，CachedThreadPool中任务的队列其实是一个SynchronousQueue，并不具备缓存task的能力，这是二者的最大区别。

您说到当线程耗尽时，快速失败和队列这两种方式处理的比较，我觉得两种都是可行的，需要考虑适用哪种方式的应该是要根据业务场景的。不允许延时的场景，failfast比队列更加合理，但是如果对延时有一定容忍能力的场景，队列比failfast更合理。

最后说一下，优先创建队列的延时问题，我认为创建线程带来的开销，可以在后面处理任务更快上弥补（因为有更多的worker在工作）。

我们对比FixedThreadPool。假如5个核心线程，最大线程数10个，队列数量5。那么在任务数量小于15个时，工作线程一直是5个。同样情况下EnhancedThreadPool的工作线程是10个，在清空队列的能力来看，无疑是EnhancedThreadPool更强，当然耗费的资源也越高这是无可避免的。

那么综合来看，EnhancedThreadPool比FixedThreadPool更适合作为请求量较大的服务的线程池。因为其处理任务的能力更强
